metadata.title: CVE-2018-18197 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libgig 4.1.0. There is an operator new[] failure(due to a big pSampleLoops heap request) in DLS::Sampler::Sampler inDLS.cpp.

criterions.comment: libgig: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
